SELECT D.DEBATE_ID, D.MEETING_ID, D.TITLE, D.OUTLINE, D.DEBATE_START_DATE, D.DEBATE_END_DATE, M.NICKNAME, P.PROFILE_ID, P.PROFILE_UUID, P.PROFILE_NAME, P.PROFILE_UPLOAD, B.COVER, MT.MEETING_TYPE FROM TBL_DEBATE D JOIN TBL_MEMBER_DEBATE MD ON D.DEBATE_ID = MD.DEBATE_ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND MD.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN TBL_PROFILE P ON M.MEMBER_ID = P.MEMBER_ID JOIN TBL_DEBATE_BOOK DB ON D.DEBATE_ID = DB.DEBATE_ID AND M.MEMBER_ID = DB.MEMBER_ID JOIN TBL_BOOK B ON DB.ISBN13 = B.ISBN13 JOIN TBL_MEETING_TYPE MT ON D.MEETING_ID = MT.MEETING_ID
WHERE DEBATE_END_DATE >= TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND DEBATE_START_DATE <= TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY DEBATE_ID ASC

WHERE D.GROUP_END_DATE > TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.GROUP_START_DATE <= TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
